page.title: 10Hobbies and Pastimes
page.content: We surveyed l3O children between the ages of 4 and ll about their hobbies and pastimes out of school. We found 5 girls belonged to Brownies and Guides. l2 boys belonged to Cubs and Scouts. l4 children belonged to Boys Brigade and Girls Brigade. 4l children belong to Maufant Youth Club. 2 children belong to the St. John's Ambulance Brigade. 35 children belong to Gymnastic Clubs. l2 children belong to the Dodo Club. 25 children take part in Water Sports. 3 children attended Ballet Classes. 3 children belong to Bands. One child belongs to the Young Farmers Club. One child plays for Maufant football team. Many children took part in more than one out of school activity. 29, mainly younger children, didn't take part in any hobbies out of school.
